7.26.18  12:58 pm   Sunshine or moonlight?

     is there a way to combine the two

7.26.18  12:54 pm   favourite shade of milk??

     black

7.26.18  12:51 pm   So I wore a rolling stones t-shirt to work one day, and there's this guy I work with who loved that I wore that shirt. He was all like "you know, it's so great to see a young person who likes REAL music and not all that crap you hear on the radio today... Hip hop and rap and pop aren't music... etc etc etc" And this guy's so happy that he met someone (me) who he can "nerd out" with and gush about all of his favorite music and stuff.... But, how can I tell this guy that just because I like some of that "classic rock" stuff, doesn't mean that I don't also like the music I hear on the radio today, and (even though I don't like genres) most of the music in listen to probably wouldn't be called "rock" by most people. I feel I've reached the point of no return and it's too late for me to admit that I like a lot of the music he loves hating on. I'm fine talking about the bands we both like, but I get really uncomfortable when the conversation turns to bash ing mode rn artists and non-rock music. And he always tries to rope me into talking about hating music that's not rock music from the 60s and 70s.

     did you tell him about the scientific studies which proved the rolling stones music was evil and detrimental to the work place

7.26.18  12:46 pm   do you think there are enough words to describe

     it's always easy to make more

7.26.18  12:05 pm   what are you doing better than when you were making 'hello sexy pants'?

     starting the arrangement on an entirely bassless setting, to ensure that it is fully functional on devices with zero bass, which are becoming extremely common among today's listeners

7.26.18  6:22 am   what is a deciding factor on what words to capitalize?

     better communication, or expression

     for me it's when i wanna make a word more of a Bam! This Is Important! or something idk it's part of my typing style i've developed but i'm curious if it's that way for you or if it's just something you do on occasion for random words

     it's not random, i only do it if it helps the communication or expression

I think I have the answer

7.26.18  2:48 am   hey bill I am still learning some whole range fingering patterns for the modes on my bass like I can play from my lowest note being the B on my 5 string to the high D on the G string in the key of C I would like some professional advice where should I go with this? or how would you use it? 

     songs. join a group. join a group that plays songs, kill 2 birds with 1 stone

7.26.18  1:57 am   make a song in microtones

     if you mean quarter tones no thanks

7.26.18  1:20 am   what is your ultimate goal with your content?

     get out of jail free

7.26.18  1:06 am   oh bill. im back home right now. it's been a while. they fight here. but im teaching them, bill. im passing on some of the lessons youve taught me, and im very good at communicating because it's HELPING them, bill.

i used to cause them a lot of grief. i would fight too -- but wouldnt do it right. i accidentally perpetuated some of this havok. it's so nice to be able to help defuse it, and create a kinder place to live for the folks i love.

thank you friend.
what's your god damn name again?

     cornfeld

7.26.18  12:41 am   Hmu with the memes dawg. I don't want no washed up cringey ass meme. I want it medium rare and if you knock me down with one I will fuck a raccoon at the stroke of midnight 

     MyPillow, the breakfast cereal. they look like little MyPillows, each with the MyPillow guy's face on them

7.25.18  11:21 pm   Which is first,chord or melody?

     it creates a magical effect when they both occur at the same time. it was so magical it was illegal in the church for quite some time

7.25.18  10:42 pm   How to not be afraid of the blank page?

     put stuff on it!

      I can't write things down, because something better always shows up after I write it and I can't delete what I already wrote because it might also be better:

     why couldn't you keep the first thing and write the other thing on the next page

      so I stare at a blank page for an hour. What do I do?

     if you really can't think of anything to put on the page you could go to the store and get some mud, that always goes great on the page

7.25.18  6:29 pm   i'm trying to guess the chords to this song but i'm pretty new to this sort of exercise so i want some confirmation that i'm not entirely wrong: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bbFAWb3eg08 (0:00-0:26)

every 2 beats:
G, Cm, Baug, Adim7, Em7, Am9, Cm, G.
Bdim7, Am, Am9, Ebdim/A, Em7, Am, Cm, G.
(even though the melody repeats exactly the chords don't feel like they do)

     
i have

G,  Cmin7,  Baug,  Cdim7
Emin7,  C6b5,  Cmin7,  G/D
Fdim,  A-7/E,  Ebaug(add A),  C#aug7
Emin7,  A7/C#,  Cmin7,  G

7.25.18  3:36 pm   How the heck do you fit so much music in your songs? I mean every possible space seems to be full but it's never too much - it's incredible. When I make music I nearly always overcrowd it or make it sound too bland. Do you often find yourself pulling bits in the arrangement stage? How do you remain objective about your songs whilst working solo? It's incredible, dude.

     i use a sprinkler system
